TopicTitle: The science is coming. When are the IVAs and all transparent windows going to come though?

Articles.Content:
The 1.2 trailer suggests that it won't be this year either.

Bummer.

4 hours ago, Superfluous J said:

If there was any reason at all to do iva maybe it'd be higher on the to do list.

Then forget that, and at least do the interiors visible from the outside. They're in for few parts, for most they aren't

Maybe the artists have been working on science and then colony parts? Interiors and IVAs are nice but they’re easy to add later so it makes sense to deprioritize them if there’s other stuff to do. Interstellar needs loads of parts too!

Inconsistency. The crew pods, the cockpits have it, while the lander cans, the rover cockpit and hab modules don't. I don't expect too many crewable parts any time soon so why not finish those that are already in there.

No, but I noticed that the couple of pods that were shown in the trailer, still had opaque windows.
